segments.text: In this drawing of a kitchen, everything seems so everyday at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is on, and the sink is overflowing dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours over the front, drenching the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, stacks of clean dishes wait patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a lovely garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and a fence, all neat and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the unstable stool, stretching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s splayed out, ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by holding out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief could end badly with a fall into the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a risky little adventure they're on.
segments.speaker: PAR
